name: Chris C.
coverLetter:
(Open availability except for 10/15-11/5)
I have several years of large scale cultivation experience with licensed farms in southern California. Experienced with automated trim machines and I'm a reliable, courteous employee with a strong, consistent work ethic. Until I can find full-time cultivation work, even part-time gigs would be appreciated. I have friends to stay with in Arcata and Manila, but I'm willing to travel elsewhere, even southern Oregon, if there's a place to camp and cook.
